original_title: Central Bank accepts COPF recommendations on pay hike: Harsha
original_body_lines: Colombo, March 21 (Daily Mirror) - The Central Bank of Sri Lanka (CBSL) has informed COPF today that they accept all  recommendations in the COPF report on the salary revisions, Committee chief Harsha De Silva said today.
The COPF requested President Ranil Wickremesinghe to appoint a committee to review the CBSL salaries, until which the salary increases will be deferred for next month.
